thumb.title: Altawil Law Group
thumb.description: Established in 2024, The Florida Divorce & Criminal Defense Lawyers are committed to providing exceptional legal representation in Coral Gables, Florida. Our dedicated team of criminal justice attorneys, trial attorneys, divorce lawyers, and family law attorneys possesses deep knowledge and experience in handling a wide range of legal matters. We specialize in helping clients navigate the complexities of divorce and criminal cases, advocating for their rights and interests every step of the way. Located at 2600 Douglas Rd, Suite 502, our firm is equipped to provide clients with personalized legal solutions and the path toward justice.Altawil Law Group2600 Douglas Rd, Suite 502, Coral Gables, FL 33134, United States786-706-8802https://thepathtojustice.com/coral-gables-law-firm/
